Class StandardEquipmentControlOutboundPort

        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPort
            • fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
              • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e1.equipments.hem.StandardEquipmentControlOutboundPort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StandardEquipmentControlCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.OutboundPortI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.PortI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlanningEquipmentControlOutboundPort, SuspensionEquipmentControlOutboundPort

    public class StandardEquipmentControlOutboundPort
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
implements StandardEquipmentControlCI
    The class StandardEquipmentControlOutboundPort implements an outbound port for the StandardEquipmentControlCI component interface.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariants

    Created on : 2021-09-09

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
